anya-e0201n:18_0: Vaṇṇo, saro, savaṇṇo, dīgho, rasso, byañjano, vaggo, niggahītaṃ.

anya-e0201n:2118_5: pāsādā vā pāsādaṃ saṅkameyya saṃ. ni. 1.132,
anya-e0201n:2118_6: hatthikkhandhā vā hatthikkhandhaṃ saṅkameyya saṃ. ni.
anya-e0201n:2118_8: Ettha ca paṭhamaṃ ekaṃ pāsādaṃ abhirūhitvā puna aññaṃ pāsādaṃ saṅkameyyāti vā paṭhamaṃ ekasmiṃ pāsāde
anya-e0201n:2118_9: nisīditvā puna aññaṃ pāsādaṃ saṅkameyyāti vā evaṃ paripuṇṇavākyaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n:2118_11: tamā vā tamaṃ gaccheyyā”ti saṃ. ni.
anya-e0201n:2118_24: Etthapi paṭhamaṃ ekaṃ vinayavacanaṃ pucchitvā vā ekasmiṃ vinayavacane ṭhatvā vā puna aññaṃ vinayavacanaṃ pucchatīti paripuṇṇavākyaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n:2119_1: ito sā purimā disā dī. ni. 3.278,
anya-e0201n:2119_2: ito sā dakkhiṇā disā dī. ni. 3.278,
anya-e0201n:2119_5: adho kesamatthakā dī. ni. 2.377; ma. ni. 1.110.
anya-e0201n:2123_1: Vibhatti nāma pageva visuṃbhūtassa atthassa kenaci adhikena vā hīnena vā bhāgena tadaññato puthakkaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0201n:2123_3: yato paṇītataro vā visiṭṭhataro vā natthi,
anya-e0201n:2123_11: paññavantā nāma sāriputtato hīnā sāriputtassa vā,
anya-e0201n:2123_12: tato adhikaṃ vā ūnaṃ vā na vaṭṭati iccādi.
anya-e0201n:2125_0: Āratī viratī pāpā khu. pā. 5.8, pāṇātipātā veramaṇi khu. pā. 2.1 iccādi.
anya-e0201n:2128_1: so parimuccati jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi,
anya-e0201n:2128_2: parimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi saṃ. ni. 3.29,
anya-e0201n:2130_2: kasmā nu tumhaṃ kule daharā na miyyare jā.
anya-e0201n:2132_0: Vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi dī. ni. 1.226, vivitto pāpakā dhammā.
anya-e0201n:2138_0: Ajjhattabhūto hetu guṇo nāma, aguṇopi idha guṇotveva vuccati, tasmiṃ pañcamī hoti vā.
anya-e0201n:2139_7: issariyā janaṃ rakkhati rājā issariyena vā,
anya-e0201n:2139_14: catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ anaññā appaṭivedhā dīghamaddhānaṃ saṃsaranti dī. ni.
anya-e0201n:2140_0: Pañhā, kathanesupi pañcamī, kuto bhavaṃ, ahaṃ pāṭaliputtato iccādi.
anya-e0201n:2141_3: muccanamattaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ hoti “nadiṃ taranto manaṃ vuḷho”ti mahāva.
anya-e0201n:2142_0: Asatvavacaneti kiṃ? Paccati munino bhattaṃ, thokaṃ thokaṃ ghare ghareti theragā. 248 (kule kule).
anya-e0201n:2143_0: “Anupubbena medhāvī, thokaṃ thokaṃ khaṇe khaṇe dha. pa. 239” iccādīsu kriyāvisesane dutiyā.
anya-e0201n:2144_1: tassa kammassa katattā upacitattā ussannattā vipulattā tathāgato suppatiṭṭhitapādo hoti dī. ni. 3.201.
anya-e0201n:2144_5: sova kattā na hotīti vattuṃ sakkā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0201n:2144_6: Etena kattusadiso janakahetu akattā nāmāti dīpeti,
anya-e0201n:2146_1: tiṇā bhiyyo na maññati dī. ni. 3.253,
anya-e0201n:2146_3: khantyā bhiyyo na vijjati saṃ. ni. 1.250,
anya-e0201n:2146_6: attamano tvaṃ hohi paraṃ viya mattāya,
anya-e0201n:2146_7: ahampi attamano homi paraṃ viya mattāya.
anya-e0201n:2150_0: 320. Chaṭṭhī sambandhe ka. 301; rū. 315; nī. 609; caṃ. 2.1.95; pā. 2.3.50.
anya-e0201n:2151_0: Dvinnaṃ sambandhīnaṃ kenaci pakārena āyattabhāvo sambandho nāma,
anya-e0201n:2152_0: Tattha kriyākārakasañjāto assedambhāvahetuko sambandho nāmāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0201n:2152_1: Tattha dve sambandhino aññamaññaṃ taṃtaṃkriyaṃ karonti,
anya-e0201n:2152_2: taṃ disvā “ime aññamaññasambandhino”ti jānantassa dvinnaṃ kārakānaṃ dvinnaṃ kriyānañca saṃyogaṃ nissāya sambandhopi vidito hoti,
anya-e0201n:2152_4: ‘imassa aya’nti evaṃ pavattabuddhiyā hetubhūtattā assedambhāvahetuko ca.
anya-e0201n:2153_0: Tattha sambandho tividho sāmisambandho, nānāttasambandho, kriyākārakasambandhoti.
anya-e0201n:2154_1: tasmā visesyapadatthassa taṃtaṃvisesanabhāvena sambandho sāmisambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n:2156_0: Tattha tassa mātā, tassa pitāiccādi janakasambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n:2157_0: Tassā putto, tassā dhītā iccādi jaññasambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n:2158_0: Tassa bhātā, tassa bhaginī iccādi kulasambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n:2159_0: Sakko devānamindo saṃ. ni. 1.248 iccādi sāmisambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n:2160_0: Pahūtaṃ me dhanaṃ sakka jā. 1.15.72, bhikkhussa pattacīvaraṃ iccādi saṃsambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n:2161_0: Ambavanassa avidūre, nibbānasseva santike dha. pa. 32 iccādi samīpasambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n:2162_0: Suvaṇṇassa rāsi, bhikkhūnaṃ samūho iccādi samūhasambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n:2163_0: Manussasseva te sīsaṃ jā. 1.4.81, rukkhassa sākhā iccādi avayavasambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n:2164_0: Suvaṇṇassa bhājanaṃ, alābussa kaṭāhaṃ, bhaṭṭhadhaññānaṃ sattu iccādi vikārasambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n:2166_0: Khandhānaṃ jāti, khandhānaṃ jarā, khandhānaṃ bhedo saṃ. ni. 2.1 iccādi avatthāsambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n:2167_1: vaṇṇo na khīyyetha tathāgatassa dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.304,
anya-e0201n:2168_0: Pādassa ukkhipanaṃ, hatthassa samiñjanaṃ, dhātūnaṃ gamanaṃ ṭhānaṃ iccādi kriyāsambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n:2169_2: so ca kriyāsambandhābhāvā kārako nāma na hoti.
anya-e0201n:2169_3: Yadi evaṃ “pādassa ukkhipanaṃ” iccādi kriyāsambandho nāmāti idaṃ na yujjatīti? Vuccate –
anya-e0201n:2169_4: kriyāsambandhābhāvāti idaṃ sādhakabhāvena sambandhābhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
anya-e0201n:2169_5: siddhāya pana kriyāya sambandhaṃ sandhāya kriyāsambandho nāma vuttoti.
anya-e0201n:2171_0: Tu, aka, ana, ṇapaccayānaṃ yoge kvaci kammatthe chaṭṭhī.
anya-e0201n:2176_0: Kammassa kārako natthi, vipākassa ca vedako visuddhi 2.689, avisaṃvādako lokassa dī. ni. 1.9 iccādi.
anya-e0201n:2177_0: Kvacīti kiṃ? Mahatiṃ mahiṃ anusāsako, janaṃ aheṭhako, kaṭaṃ kārako, pasavo ghātako iccādi.
anya-e0201n:2180_0: Kvacīti kiṃ? Bhagavantaṃ dassanāya udā. 23 iccādi.
anya-e0201n:2183_3: catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo dha. sa. 596-
anya-e0201n:2184_1: māna’ntānaṃ yoge pana kammani dutiyā eva,
anya-e0201n:2185_0: Kvaci chaṭṭhīpi dissati, dhammassa gutto medhāvī dha. pa. 257 iccādi.
anya-e0201n:2189_2: sobhaṇā buddhaghosassa pakati buddhaghosena vā iccādi.
anya-e0201n:2190_7: 121 pūrati dhaññānaṃ vā muggānaṃ vā māsānaṃ vā iccādi.
anya-e0201n:2191_2: yakkhasenāpatīnaṃ ujjhāpetabbaṃ vikkanditabbaṃ viravitabbaṃ dī. ni.
anya-e0201n:2192_1: kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmi,
anya-e0201n:2193_3: kusalo tvaṃ rathassa aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ ma. ni. 2.87,
anya-e0201n:2193_9: santi yakkhā buddhassa pasannā dī. ni.
anya-e0201n:2194_0: 321. Chaṭṭhī hetvatthehi rū. 163 piṭṭhe; nī. 650; caṃ. 2.1.71; pā. 2.3.26.
anya-e0201n:2196_0: Taṃ kissa hetu ma. ni. 1.2; caṃ. 2.1.96; pā. 2.3.72,
anya-e0201n:2198_0: Tulyatthena yoge chaṭṭhī hoti tatiyā vā.
anya-e0201n:2199_0: Tulyo pitu pitarā vā, sadiso pitu pitarā vā. Iti nānāttasambandho.
anya-e0201n:2200_0: Kriyākārakasambandho nāma kārakānaṃ kriyāya saha sādhaka,
anya-e0201n:2200_2: na hi kriyaṃ vinā kārakaṃ nāma sijjhati,
anya-e0201n:2200_3: na ca kārakaṃ vinā kriyā nāma sijjhatīti,
anya-e0201n:2204_0: 323. Sattamyādhāre ka. 302; rū. 313; nī. 630; caṃ. 2.1.88; pā. 1.3.45.
anya-e0201n:2206_2: Tattha kaṭo kattubhūte purise ṭhitaṃ nisīdanakriyaṃ dhāreti,
anya-e0201n:2206_3: thālī kammabhūte taṇḍule ṭhitaṃ pacanakriyaṃ dhāreti.
anya-e0201n:2207_0: So catubbidho byāpikādhāro, opasilesikādhāro, sāmīpikādhāro, vesayikādhāroti.
anya-e0201n:2208_0: Tattha yasmiṃ ādheyyavatthu sakale vā ekadese vā byāpetvā tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0201n:2210_0: Yo pana attho ādheyyassa avatthubhūtopi tadāyattavuttidīpanatthaṃ ādhārabhāvena vohariyati,
anya-e0201n:2211_0: Yo ca attho attanā vinā ādheyyassa aññatthattaṃ kriyaṃ sampādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā ādhārabhāvena vohariyati,
anya-e0201n:2211_1: yo ca ādheyyassa anaññābhimukhabhāvadīpanatthaṃ ādhārabhāvena vohariyati,
anya-e0201n:2215_1: Yambhāvo bhāvalakkhaṇaṃ ka. 313; rū. 327; nī. 644; caṃ. 2.1.90; pā. 2.3.37;
anya-e0201n:2217_0: Acirapakkantassa sāriputtassa brāhmaṇo kālamakāsi ma. ni.
anya-e0201n:2217_2: appamattassa te viharato itthāgāropi te appamatto viharissati saṃ. ni.
anya-e0201n:2218_1: imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hoti saṃ. ni. 2.21,
anya-e0201n:2220_0: Pubbaṇhasamaye gato, sāyanhasamaye āgato iccādi vesayikādhāro eva.
anya-e0201n:2222_0: 326. Chaṭṭhī cānādare ka. 305; rū. 323; nī. 633; caṃ. 2.1.91; pā. 2.3.38.
anya-e0201n:2223_2: anādarabhūte bhāvalakkhaṇe gamyamāne sattamī chaṭṭhī ca hoti.
anya-e0201n:2225_0: 327. Yato niddhāraṇaṃ ka. 304; rū. 322; nī. 632; caṃ. 2.1.92; pā. 2.3.41.
anya-e0201n:2228_0: Manussānaṃ khattiyo sūratamo, manussesu khattiyo sūratamo.
anya-e0201n:2232_0: Addhikānaṃ dhāvanto sīghatamo, addhikesu dhāvanto sīghatamo.
anya-e0201n:2234_0: Āyasmā ānando arahataṃ aññataro, arahantesu aññataro iccādi.
anya-e0201n:2239_3: saṅghe dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi ma. ni. 3.376,
anya-e0201n:2240_0: Apādāne ca sattamī, gadalīsu gaje rakkhantiiccādi.
anya-e0201n:2241_0: Sāmissarādiyoge pana chaṭṭhī sattamī ca hoti,
anya-e0201n:2243_0: Adhikabhāvatthe upena yuttā liṅgamhā sattamī hoti.
anya-e0201n:2244_0: Upa khāriyaṃ doṇo, upa nikkhe kahāpaṇaṃ, atirekadoṇā khārī, atirekakahāpaṇaṃ nikkhanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n:2246_0: Sāmibhāvatthe adhinā yuttā liṅgamhā sattamī hoti.
anya-e0201n:2247_3: Tattha ‘adhi brahmadatte pañcālā’ti brahmadattissarā pañcālaraṭṭhavāsinoti vadanti,
anya-e0201n:2249_0: Hetvatthehi yoge sabbādīhi sabbanāmehi hetvatthe sabbā vibhattiyo honti.
anya-e0201n:2257_7: vacanesupi yebhuyyena ekarūpena pavattatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n:2258_1: ayaṃ pana pakati abyayaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0201n:2259_0: 331. Syādisyādinekatthaṃ ka. 316; rū. 331; nī. 675; caṃ. 2.2.1; pā. 2.1.4.
anya-e0201n:2260_4: syādipadaṃ syādipadena saha ekatthaṃ hotīti attho.
anya-e0201n:2261_1: nipātehi saddhiṃ sabbāni nāmikapadāni nāmapaṭirūpakāni ca saṅgaṇhāti,
anya-e0201n:2263_0: ‘Ekattha’nti etena dvandasamāsepi padānaṃ ekakattu, ekakammādibhāvena ekatthībhāvo vutto hotīti.
anya-e0201n:2264_1: Asaṅkhyaṃ vibhattisampattisamīpasākalyābhāvayathāpacchāyugapadatthe ka. 319; rū. 330; nī. 696; caṃ. 2.2.2; pā. 2.1.6.
anya-e0201n:2265_10: yugapadatthe pavattaṃ asaṅkhyaṃ nāma syādipadaṃ aññena syādipadena saha ekatthaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n:2265_11: Ayañca samāso anvatthavasena ‘asaṅkhyo’ti ca ‘abyayībhāvo’ti ca vuccati.
anya-e0201n:2267_5: tassa ca atthaṃ kathentena niccasamāsattā aññapadena viggaho kātabbo “itthīsu pavattā kathā”ti vā “itthīsu
anya-e0201n:2267_6: pavatto vacanapatho”ti vā “itthīsu pavattaṃ vacana”nti vā,
anya-e0201n:2267_9: ekatthasaññāya pana katāya vākyatthāya payuttānaṃ vibhattīnaṃ attho ekatthapadena vutto hoti,
anya-e0201n:2270_3: Tathā hi ‘rājaputto’ti ettha puttasaddattho eva tathāvidheyyo hoti,
anya-e0201n:2270_5: sabbañca vacanavākyaṃ nāma vidheyyatthehi eva sijjhati,
anya-e0201n:2270_7: yasmā ca ‘rājaputto’ti etaṃ puttasaddatthasseva nāmaṃ hoti,
anya-e0201n:2270_9: tasmā eko padhānabhūto puttasaddattho eva tesaṃ dvinnaṃ saddānaṃ attho nāma hoti,
anya-e0201n:2270_15: Tissaṃ tividhāyaṃ ekatthatāyaṃ sabbāsaṃ vuttatthānaṃ syādivibhattīnaṃ lopo hotīti iminā sussa lopo.
anya-e0201n:2271_0: 334. Taṃ napuṃsakaṃ ka. 320; rū. 335; nī. 698; caṃ. 2.2.15; pā. 2.4.18.
anya-e0201n:2272_0: Taṃ asaṅkhyaṃ nāma ekatthaṃ napuṃsakaṃ hotīti iminā adhitthīsaddassa napuṃsakabhāvaṃ katvā tato syādyuppatti.
anya-e0201n:2274_0: Napuṃsakassa ekatthassa rasso hoti syādīsu vibhattīsūti iminā īkārassa rasso.
anya-e0201n:2275_0: 336. Pubbasmāmādito ka. 343; rū. 338; nī. 375; caṃ. 2.1.40; pā. 1.1.41.
anya-e0201n:2276_1: tato parāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo hoti,
anya-e0201n:2276_5: iti amādito pubbabhūtā asaṅkhyekatthā parāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo hotīti iminā adhitthisaddato sabbavibhattīnaṃ lopo.
anya-e0201n:2277_4: Esa nayo sesavibhattīsu sesavacanesu sesaliṅgesu ca.
anya-e0201n:2277_5: Evaṃ sabbaliṅgesu sabbavibhattīsu sabbavacanesu ca ekeneva rūpena tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0201n:2278_2: uparigaṅga” miccādīsu sampatyādīhi visesatthehi rahito kevalo vibhattīnaṃ attho vuccati.
anya-e0201n:2278_4: pavattā” iccādīni samāsasāmatthiyena viditāni atthapadāni nāma,
anya-e0201n:2279_1: pavattā vādhammāti atthe vibhattīnaṃ lope kate adhiattasaddassa napuṃsakabhāvaṃ katvā tato syādyuppatti,
anya-e0201n:2281_0: Akārantamhā asaṅkhyekatthā paraṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo na hoti,
anya-e0201n:2283_0: Apañcamiyāti kiṃ? Ajjhattā apeti, ajjhattehi apeti.
anya-e0201n:2284_0: 338. Vā tatiyāsattamīnaṃ ka. 341; rū. 336; nī. 733; caṃ. 2.1.42; pā. 2.4.84; mu. 4.3.375.
anya-e0201n:2285_0: Akārantamhā asaṅkhyekatthā paraṃ tatiyā, sattamīnaṃ vikappena aṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n:2286_11: ‘ajjhattaṃ dhammā’ti ajjhattabhūtā dhammā iccādinā attho veditabbo.
anya-e0201n:2286_12: Attānaṃ adhikicca pavatto pavattāti vā vuttepi attassa ādhārabhāvo sijjhatiyeva.
anya-e0201n:2286_14: attani visuṃ visuṃ pavattaṃ pavattāni vā paccattaṃ.
anya-e0201n:2286_16: bahiddhā abhinivisitvā ajjhattaṃ vuṭṭhātī”ti dha. sa. aṭṭha. 350; saṃ. ni. aṭṭha.
anya-e0201n:2288_2: Ettha ca ‘akāle sakatthassā’ti suttena sahasaddassa sādeso,
anya-e0201n:2292_1: tiṇena saddhiṃ sakalaṃ vatthuṃ ajjhoharatīti attho.
anya-e0201n:2294_5: Ettha ca ‘sampannaṃ brahma’ntiādinā saddabyākaraṇesu atthavacanaṃ saddatthavibhāvanamattaṃ.
anya-e0201n:2294_6: Suttantesu pana imesaṃ padānaṃ yuttaṃ abhidheyyatthaṃ ñatvā tadanurūpaṃ atthavacanampi veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n:2299_2: Tattha asaniphalena saha pavattaṃ cakkaṃ sacakkaṃ,
anya-e0201n:2299_3: gadāvudhena yugaḷapavattaṃ vāsudevassa cakkāvudhantipi vadanti yugapadatthe sacakkaṃ nidhehi,
anya-e0201n:2299_7: he bisaṇu! cakkena saha yugapadekakāle gadaṃ dhāraya.
anya-e0201n:2300_0: 339. Yathā natulye ka. 319; rū. 330; nī. 696; caṃ. 2.2.3; pā. 2.1.7.
anya-e0201n:2301_0: Tulyato aññasmiṃ atthe pavatto yathāsaddo syādinā saha ekattho hoti moggallāne aññathāvutti dassitā.
anya-e0201n:2302_0: Yathāsatti, yathābalaṃ, yathākkamaṃ, ye ye vuḍḍhā yathāvuḍḍhaṃ, vuḍḍhānaṃ paṭipāṭi vā yathāvuḍḍhaṃ.
anya-e0201n:2303_0: Natulyeti kiṃ? Yathā devadatto, tathā yaññadatto.
anya-e0201n:2304_0: 340. Yāvāvadhāraṇe ka. 319; rū. 330; nī. 696; caṃ. 2.2.4; pā. 2.1.8.
anya-e0201n:2305_0: Avadhāraṇaṃ vuccati paricchindanaṃ, avadhāraṇe pavatto yāvasaddo syādinā saha ekattho bhavati.
anya-e0201n:2307_1: Parāpābahitiropurepacchā vā pañcamyā ka. 319; rū. 330; nī. 696; caṃ. 2.2.7; pā. 2.1.12, 13;
anya-e0201n:2308_0: Pari, apa, āiccādayo saddā pañcamyantena syādinā saha ekatthā bhavanti vā.
anya-e0201n:2309_0: Pabbatato pari samantā vassīti devo paripabbataṃ paripabbatā vā,
anya-e0201n:2309_3: pāṭaliputtato bahiddhā vassīti devo āpāṭaliputtaṃ āpāṭaliputtā vā,
anya-e0201n:2309_4: ākumārehi kaccāyanassa yaso vattatīti ākumāraṃ ākumārā vā,
anya-e0201n:2309_5: ābhavaggā bhagavato yaso vattatīti ābhavaggaṃ ābhavaggā vā,

anya-e0201n:2311_0: Samīpe āyāme ca pavatto anusaddo syādinā saha ekattho bhavati vā.
anya-e0201n:2312_0: Vanassa samīpaṃ anuvanaṃ, asani anuvanaṃ gatā, gaṅgaṃ anuyātā anugaṅgaṃ, bārāṇasī.
anya-e0201n:2313_1: Oro pari paṭi pāre majjhe heṭṭhuddhādhonto vā chaṭṭhiyā ka. 319; rū. 330; nī. 696; caṃ. 2.2.11; pā. 2.1.18;
anya-e0201n:2314_0: Orādayo saddā chaṭṭhīyantena syādinā saha ekatthā bhavanti vā.
anya-e0201n:2317_0: 344. Tiṭṭhagvādīni ka. 319; rū. 330; nī. 697; caṃ. 2.2.10; pā. 2.1.17.
anya-e0201n:2320_0: Tathā pāto nahānaṃ yasmiṃ kāleti pātanahānaṃ.
anya-e0201n:2320_9: Ettha ca ‘tiṭṭhagu’ iccādīni viggahatthavasena aññapadatthe siddhāni viya dissanti,
anya-e0201n:2320_10: aññapadassa pana liṅgādīnaṃ vasena tesaṃ rūpavikāro nāma natthi,
anya-e0201n:2320_12: sabbañcetaṃ asaṅkhyasamāsapadaṃ nāma napuṃsakaṃ eva hoti,

anya-e0201n:2324_4: Yathā hi tappurisasaddo visesanapadatthaṃ jahitvā visesyapadatthe tiṭṭhati,

anya-e0201n:2326_2: Iminā amādisahitassa vākyassa amādekatthasaññaṃ katvā vuttatthānaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo,
anya-e0201n:2328_0: Tattha dutiyātappuriso kattuvācakesu gata, nissita,- atīta,

anya-e0201n:2329_17: oghaṃ tiṇṇoti oghatiṇṇo oghaṃ tiṇṇo vā iccādi.
anya-e0201n:2331_0: Bahulādhikārattā ta, tavantu, tāvī, anta, māna, tuna, tvāna, tvā, tuṃ,

anya-e0201n:2348_0: Pañcamītappuriso apagamana, bhaya, virati, mocanādiatthesu paresu hoti.
anya-e0201n:2350_0: Kvaci niccasamāso hoti, mātito jāto mātujo. Evaṃ pitujo, kammajaṃ, cittajaṃ, utujaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n:2356_0: “Bhaṭo rañño putto devadattassā”ti ettha ‘rājaputto’ti na hoti aññamaññānapekkhattā.
anya-e0201n:2356_1: “Devadattassa kaṇhā dantā”ti ettha ‘devadattakaṇhadantā’ti na hoti aññasāpekkhattā nī. 690.
anya-e0201n:2356_2: Aññasāpekkhattepi niccaṃ sambandhīpekkhasaddānaṃ samāso hoti vākye viya samāsepi sambandhassa viditattā.
anya-e0201n:2356_3: Vuttañca “satipi sāpekkhatte gamakattā samāso hotī”ti ka. 328; rū. 352; nī. 691,
anya-e0201n:2356_11: “Rañño māgadhassa bimbisārassa putto”ti etthapi aññasāpekkhattā ‘bimbisāraputto’ti na hoti,
anya-e0201n:2356_12: rañño go ca asso ca puriso cāti atthe ‘rājagavassapurisā’ti hoti dvandato pubbapadassa dvandapadehipi paccekaṃ sambandhassa viditattā.
anya-e0201n:2359_1: Ettha ca kārakānaṃ kriyāsādhanalakkhaṇattā kriyāpadeheva sambandho hoti,
anya-e0201n:2359_2: tasmā akriyavācakena parapadena saddhiṃ samāse jāte majjhe anurūpaṃ kriyāpadaṃ viññāyati,
anya-e0201n:2359_3: yathā ‘assena yutto ratho assaratho’ iti ‘rūpe saññā’ti rūpe uppannā saññāti attho.
anya-e0201n:2370_0: Sabbo cāyaṃ amāditappuriso abhidheyyavacano parapadaliṅgo ca.
anya-e0201n:2374_1: Yathā kammaṃ kriyañca payojanañca dvayaṃ dhāreti kamme sati tassa dvayassa sambhavato,
anya-e0201n:2374_2: tathā ayaṃ samāso ekassa atthassa dve nāmāni dhāreti imasmiṃ samāse sati ekatthajotakassa nāmadvayassa sambhavatoti ka. 324; rū. 339; nī. 702.
anya-e0201n:2375_4: kammadhāriyasaddasadisattā sabbo cāyaṃ samāso kammadhārayoti vuccati issa attaṃ katvā.
anya-e0201n:2375_5: Yathā hi kammadhāriyasaddo ekassa atthassa dve nāmāni dhāreti,
anya-e0201n:2375_7: So eva uttarapadatthapadhānatāsaṅkhātena tappurisalakkhaṇena yuttattā ‘tappuriso’ti ca vuccati.
anya-e0201n:2375_8: Bhinnapavattinimittānaṃ dvinnaṃ padānaṃ visesanavisesitabbabhāvena ekasmiṃ atthe pavatti tulyādhikaraṇatā nāma,
anya-e0201n:2375_10: So eva ca visesanapadavasena guṇavisesadīpanattā ‘visesanasamāso’ti ca vuccati.
anya-e0201n:2376_0: 346. Visesanamekatthena ka. 324; rū. 339; nī. 702; caṃ. 2.2.18; pā. 2.1.57.
anya-e0201n:2377_0: Visesanabhūtaṃ syādyantapadaṃ ekatthena visesyabhūtena syādyantapadena saddhiṃ ekatthaṃ hoti.

anya-e0201n:2378_6: Pavattinimittānañca adhiṭṭhānatte sati padānampi adhiṭṭhānatā siddhā hoti.
anya-e0201n:2380_3: Ettha ca “sā senā dissate mahā jā. 2.22.771,
anya-e0201n:2380_6: Tasmā samāsepi tiliṅge nipātarūpo mahāsaddo yujjati.
anya-e0201n:2380_7: Mahā ca so puriso cāti mahāpuriso,
anya-e0201n:2380_8: mahā ca sā nadī cāti mahānadī,

anya-e0201n:2381_0: Ettha ca dvīhi casaddehi dvinnaṃ padānaṃ sakatthanānāttaṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0201n:2381_1: Taṃsaddena sakatthanānāttepi sakatthānaṃ adhikaraṇabhūtassa dabbatthassa ekattaṃ dīpeti.

anya-e0201n:2381_4: santo ca so puriso cāti sappuriso,
anya-e0201n:2382_2: vinayo ca so pariyatti cāti vinayapariyatti,
anya-e0201n:2382_4: avijjā ca sā paccayo cāti avijjāpaccayo,
anya-e0201n:2382_8: sīlañca taṃ patiṭṭhā cāti sīlapatiṭṭhā iccādi.

anya-e0201n:2388_7: saddhammo ca so raṃsi cāti saddhammaraṃsi.
anya-e0201n:2389_14: Ettha ca sambhāvanā nāma sāmaññabhūtassa uttarapadatthassa daḷhaṃ katvā thomanā sarūpavisesadīpanā,

anya-e0201n:2436_1: tādiso gāmo vā deso vā janapado vā,
anya-e0201n:2436_2: bahubbīhisaddasadisattā sabbo cāyaṃ samāso bahubbīhīti vuccati.
anya-e0201n:2436_3: Yathā hi bahubbīhisaddo samāsapadatthe atikkamma gāma, desa,
anya-e0201n:2437_0: So saṅkhepena duvidho tagguṇasaṃviññāṇo, atagguṇasaṃviññāṇo cāti.
anya-e0201n:2438_1: so aññapadatthassa visesanabhūtattā tassa aññapadatthassa guṇoti atthena tagguṇoti vuccati,
anya-e0201n:2438_4: tagguṇaṃ amuñcitvā tagguṇena saheva viññāṇo aññapadattho yasminti tagguṇasaṃviññāṇo,
anya-e0201n:2438_6: yattha samāsapadattho avayavabhāvena vā sahavidheyyabhāvena vā aññapadatthe antogadho hoti,
anya-e0201n:2439_0: Ettha ca ‘buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa bhattaṃ detī’ti bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bhattaṃ deti,
anya-e0201n:2439_1: pamukhabhūtassa buddhassa ca bhattaṃ detīti attho.
anya-e0201n:2439_7: Evaṃ yojanārahatā aññapadatthena saha samāsapadatthassa vidheyyatā nāmāti.
anya-e0201n:2446_0: Anekaṃ syādyantapadaṃ aññapadassa atthe vikappena ekatthaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n:2447_0: Saha vitakkenāti savitakko, vitakkena saha yo vattatīti vā savitakko, samādhi.
anya-e0201n:2448_0: Ettha ca ‘saha vitakkenā’ti ettha paṭhamāvibhattiyā atthabhūto aññapadattho vākyasāmatthiyena sijjhati.
anya-e0201n:2448_1: Na hi kriyākārakarahitaṃ vākyaṃ nāma sambhavati,
anya-e0201n:2448_4: ekatthībhāve ca honte vākye ṭhitānaṃ aññapadānaṃ vibhattīnañca sabbe atthā ekatthabhūtena samāsena vuttā nāma honti,
anya-e0201n:2448_5: aññapadāni ca vibhattiyo ca vuttatthā nāma,
anya-e0201n:2448_8: evaṃ sabbasamāsesu vākyedissamānānaṃ ya, ta, eta, ima, iti, eva, iva, viya, ca,
anya-e0201n:2448_10: vibhattīnañca lope sati sarantānaṃ byañjanantānañca samāsapadānaṃ sayameva pakatibhāvo,
anya-e0201n:2448_11: idha pana ‘sahassa soññatthe’ti suttena sahasaddassa sattaṃ,
anya-e0201n:2449_1: Kāyabyāmānaṃ samapamāṇattā nigrodho iva parimaṇḍalo nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo,
anya-e0201n:2449_2: nigrodho iva vā parimaṇḍalo yo hotīti so nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo,
anya-e0201n:2449_6: sattānaṃ paññācakkhupaṭilābhakaraṇena tesaṃ cakkhu viya bhūtoti cakkhubhūto,
anya-e0201n:2449_7: lokuttaradhammapaṭilābhakaraṇena tesaṃ dhammo viya bhūtoti dhammabhūto,
anya-e0201n:2449_9: andho viya bhūto ayanti andhabhūto iccādi.

anya-e0201n:2730_0: Uttarapade pare nta, ntūnaṃ a hoti.
anya-e0201n:2733_0: Rī, rikkha, kapaccayantesu paresu samānassa so hoti.

anya-e0201n:2737_4: ayaṃ viya so dissatīti īdī, īdikkho, īdiso.

anya-e0201n:2811_0: Aññe ca saddā kriyatthehi syādyantehi saha bahulaṃ ekatthā honti.
anya-e0201n:2813_0: Tyādisaddāpi saññābhāvaṃ pattā nipātarūpā honti, syādirūpā ca. Tasmā tepi imasmiṃ sutte saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0201n:2815_0: Ehi bhaddanteti vuttopi na etīti naehibhaddantiko dī. ni. 1.394,
anya-e0201n:2815_1: tiṭṭha bhaddanteti vuttopi na tiṭṭhatīti natiṭṭhabhaddantiko,

anya-e0201n:2875_17: Ekamekasmiñca ṭhāne nava padāni ca nava antaranavantāni ca honti.
anya-e0201n:2876_4: Tattha mūlabhūmiyā antimaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā dasaguṇite kate koṭibhūmiyaṃ ekaṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0201n:2877_2: Tattha koṭibhūmiyā antimaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā dasaguṇite kate pakoṭibhūmiyaṃ ekaṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0201n:2877_5: iminā nayena sabbabhūmīsu uparūpari bhūmisaṅkanti ca ṭhānabhedo ca veditabbo.
anya-e0201n:2878_22: asaṅkhyeyyabhūmīti ekavīsati bhūmiyo sattacattālīsasataṃ ṭhānāni ca honti.
anya-e0201n:2879_10: Ettha ca yasmā pāḷibhāsāyaṃ dasasatasahassaṃ nāma sattamaṭṭhānaṃ natthi,
anya-e0201n:2879_13: 1.181 āgatanayena sattamaṭṭhānaṃ ullaṅghetvā chaṭṭhaṭṭhānato upari bhūmisaṅkantiṃ kathentā sataguṇitaṃ katvā kathenti,
anya-e0201n:2880_0: Tattha satasahassānaṃ sataṃ nāma dasasatasahassānaṃ dasakameva hoti,
anya-e0201n:2880_1: tasmā tathā kathentāpi bhūmīnaṃ sabbaṭṭhānānañca dasaguṇasiddhimeva kathentīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n:2880_2: Yasmā ca gaṇanabhūmisaṅkhāto gaṇanapatho nāma nānādesavāsīnaṃ vasena nānāvidho hoti,
anya-e0201n:2880_4: mahākathānāni vajjetvā pāḷinayena sattarasa bhūmiyova vuttā.
anya-e0201n:2880_8: katthaci pana mahābalakkhandhapariyantā saṭṭhi bhūmiyoti āgatā.
anya-e0201n:2881_0: Tattha sakasakabhūmito atirekavatthūni gaṇanapathavītivattāni nāma honti,
anya-e0201n:2882_0: Api ca ‘gaṇanapathavītivatta’nti ca ‘gaṇanapathātikkanta’nti ca ‘asaṅkhyeyya’nti ca atthato ekaṃ.
anya-e0201n:2882_1: Tasmā idhapi vīsati bhūmiyo eva anukkamena dasaguṇitā gaṇanapathā nāma honti.
anya-e0201n:2882_2: Asaṅkhyeyyanti pana dasaguṇavinimuttā gaṇanapathātikkantabhūmi eva vuccati.
anya-e0201n:2882_3: Mahākathānabhūmātikkantato paṭṭhāya hi anantamahāpathaviyā sabbapaṃsucuṇṇānipi idha asaṅkhyeyyabhūmiyaṃ saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0201n:2882_4: Itarathā asaṅkhyeyyanti ca gaṇanapathabhūmīti ca viruddhametanti.
anya-e0201n:2883_3: na tu gaṇanapathātikkantā visuṃ asaṅkhyeyyabhūmi nāma.
anya-e0201n:2884_1: 833 pana pāḷinayaṃ gahetvā “vīsati abbudāni ekaṃ nirabbudaṃ nāma.
anya-e0201n:2884_2: Vīsati nirabbudāni ekaṃ ababaṃ nāma” iccādinā nirabbudādīnaṃ saṅkhyānampi vīsatimattaguṇaṃ nāma vuttaṃ.
anya-e0201n:2884_5: nirabbudādīnaṃ dasannaṃ nirayānaṃ tāni nāmāni siddhāni bhavanti.
anya-e0201n:2884_6: Garū pana tāni nāmāni gahetvā dasaguṇasiddhesu gaṇanapathesu pakkhipiṃsu,
anya-e0201n:2885_3: Ettha ca yadi gaṇanabhūmipathepi nirabbudānaṃ vīsatimattena abababhūmi bhaveyya,
anya-e0201n:2885_4: evaṃ sati nirabbudānaṃ satasahassaṃ nāma na vucceyya.
anya-e0201n:2885_7: ettakaṃ bakassa brahmuno tasmiṃbhave avasiṭṭhaṃ āyū”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0201n:2885_8: Tasmā imaṃ gaṇanabhūmipathaṃ patvā vīsatiguṇaṃ nāma natthīti siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n:2885_11: Evaṃ pakkhittānañca cuddasannaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ kaccāyane kamokkamatā pana pacchājātā siyāti.
anya-e0201n:2890_2: tasmā tesaṃ tesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ hitanti taddhitaṃ,

anya-e0201n:2895_0: Padānaṃ ādibhūtassa akārassa ca ivaṇṇu’vaṇṇassa ca ā, e,

anya-e0201n:2896_4: vasiṭṭhassa kulaṃ vāsiṭṭhanti evampi yojetuṃ yujjati.
anya-e0201n:2897_0: Tattha ‘vasiṭṭhassā’ti etena gottasseva pitubhūtaṃ ādipurisaṃ vadati. Kasmā?
anya-e0201n:2897_2: Evañhi sati tasmiṃ gotte paccājātā sabbepi janā tassa apaccā nāma honti.
anya-e0201n:2899_0: Majjhe pavattānaṃ a, yuvaṇṇānaṃ ā, e, ovuddhiyo honti vā kvaci.

anya-e0201n:2902_0: Upagussa apaccanti ettha ‘uvaṇṇassāvaṅa…’ti ṇānubandhe paccaye pare uvaṇṇassa avaṅa hoti. Opagavo, opagavī, opagavaṃ,
anya-e0201n:2903_0: 433. Vacchādito ṇānaṇāyanā ka. 345; rū. 366; nī. 754; pā. 4.1.93, 94, 162, 163.

anya-e0201n:2906_1: Kattikāvidhavādīhi ṇeyyaṇerā ka. 346; rū. 367; nī. 755; pā. 4.1.120, 123, 126, 127, 128, 129, 131.
anya-e0201n:2907_0: Chaṭṭhyantehi kattikādīhi vidhavādīhi ca tassa apaccanti atthe kamena ṇānubandhā eyya,

anya-e0201n:2913_0: Ye pare avaṇṇassa ivaṇṇassa ca lopo hotīti ṇyamhi pare avaṇṇi’vaṇṇānaṃ lopo.
anya-e0201n:2914_0: Ditiyā nāma devadhītāya apaccaṃ decco, aditiyā apaccaṃ ādicco.

anya-e0201n:2917_0: Sare pare uvaṇṇassa avaṅa hotīti uvaṇṇassa avattaṃ.
anya-e0201n:2919_0: Rassā’kārantato apaccatthe ṇānubandho rassi’paccayo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n:2921_0: 439. Rājato ño jātiyaṃ ka. 347; rū. 368; nī. 756; caṃ. 2.4.70; pā. 4.1.137.
anya-e0201n:2922_0: Jātiyaṃ gamyamānāyaṃ rājasaddamhā apaccatthe ñapaccayo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n:2923_0: Rañño apaccaṃ rājañño, rājakulassa puttoti attho.
anya-e0201n:2926_0: Jātiyaṃ gamyamānāyaṃ khattasaddamhā apaccatthe ya, iyapaccayā honti.
anya-e0201n:2930_0: Jātiyaṃ gamyamānāyaṃ manusaddamhā apaccatthe ssa, saṇapaccayā honti.
anya-e0201n:2933_1: Janapadanāmasmā janakhattiyā raññe ca ṇo ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765; caṃ. 2.4.96; pā. 4.1.168;
anya-e0201n:2934_0: Janavācinā ca khattiyavācinā ca janapadanāmamhā raññe ca apacce ca ṇo hoti.
anya-e0201n:2936_0: Janapadanāmasmāti kiṃ? Dasaratharañño putto dāsarathi dāsaraṭṭhi.
anya-e0201n:2937_0: Janakhattiyāti kiṃ? Pañcālassa brāhmaṇassa apaccaṃ pañcāli.
anya-e0201n:2939_0: Kuru, sivisaddehi apacce raññe ca ṇyo hoti.
anya-e0201n:2943_0: 444. Ṇa rāgā tena rattaṃ ka. 347; rū. 368; nī. 756; caṃ. 3.1.1 …pe… 4.2.1.
anya-e0201n:2944_0: Rajjanti vatthaṃ etenāti rāgo, rajanavatthu, rāgavācimhā tena rattanti atthe ṇo hoti.
anya-e0201n:2945_0: Kasāvena rattaṃ vatthaṃ kāsāvaṃ dha. pa. 9,
anya-e0201n:2946_2: pītādisaddā guṇasaddattā paccayena vinā guṇanissayaṃ dabbaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0201n:2947_0: 445. Nakkhatteninduyuttena kāle ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765; caṃ. 3.1.5; pā. 4.2.3.
anya-e0201n:2948_0: Induyuttena nakkhattena lakkhite kāle tannakkhattavācīhi ṇo hoti.
anya-e0201n:2949_0: Puṇṇacandayuttena phussanakkhattena lakkhitā phussā, ratti, phusso, aho. Evaṃ māgho iccādi.
anya-e0201n:2953_0: 446. Sāssa devatā puṇṇamāsī ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765; caṃ. 3.1.18, 19 …pe… 4.2.21-24.
anya-e0201n:2954_0: Sā assa devatā, sā assa puṇṇamāsīti atthe paṭhamantā ṇo hoti.
anya-e0201n:2955_1: yo buddhaṃ attano ārakkhadevataṃ viya garuṃ katvā vicarati,
anya-e0201n:2957_0: Puṇṇamāsīti kiṃ? Phussī assa pañcamī tithī.
anya-e0201n:2958_0: 447. Tamadhīte taṃ jānāti kaṇikā ca ka. 351; rū. 374; nī. 764; caṃ. 3.1.37 …pe… 4.2.59.
anya-e0201n:2959_0: Etesu atthesu dutiyantā ṇo ca ko ca ṇiko cāti ete paccayā honti.
anya-e0201n:2960_1: byākaraṇaṃ adhīte jānāti vā veyyākaraṇo dī. ni. 1.256.
anya-e0201n:2960_3: byañjanaṃ adhīte jānāti vā veyyañjaniko”ti imāni ṇikena sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n:2961_0: Kamhi-chandaṃ adhīte jānāti vā chando. Evaṃ padako dī. ni. 1.256, nāmako.
anya-e0201n:2962_0: Ṇikamhi-vinayaṃ adhīte jānāti vā venayiko, suttantiko, ābhidhammiko.
anya-e0201n:2963_0: Ettha ca ‘veyyākaraṇo’ti pade viyyākaraṇaṃ adhīteti vākyaṃ,
anya-e0201n:2963_6: suvaggasaddānaṃ taddhitabhāve eva siddhattā dvāreti ca saggāyāti ca kathetabbo.
anya-e0201n:2964_0: 448. Tassa visaye dese ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 365; caṃ. 3.1.61; pā. 4.2.52, 53.
anya-e0201n:2965_0: Tassa desarūpe visaye chaṭṭhuntā ṇo hoti.
anya-e0201n:2967_0: 449. Nivāse tannāme ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 365; caṃ. 3.1.64; pā. 4.2.69.
anya-e0201n:2971_0: Samīpe bhavaṃ anubhavaṃ, “adūrabhave”tipi pāṭho, tannāme anubhave dese chaṭṭhyantā ṇo hoti.
anya-e0201n:2972_0: Vidisāya anubhavaṃ vedisaṃ, nagaraṃ, udumbarassa anubhavaṃ odumbaraṃ, vimānaṃ.
anya-e0201n:2974_0: Tannāme tena nibbatte dese tatiyantā ṇo hoti.
anya-e0201n:2975_4: ayañca tatiyā hetumhi kattari karaṇe ca yathāyogaṃ yujjati.
anya-e0201n:2977_0: Taṃ idha atthīti atthe tannāme dese paṭhamantā ṇo hoti.
anya-e0201n:2978_0: Udumbarā asmiṃ dese santīti odumbaro, badarā asmiṃ dese santīti bādaro. Evaṃ pabbajo.
anya-e0201n:2981_8: pure bhavā porī dī. ni. 1.9, vācā,
anya-e0201n:2983_0: Ṇānubandhe paccaye pare manādīnaṃ ante sāgamo hotīti sabbattha manogaṇādīnaṃ ante sāgamo.
anya-e0201n:2984_0: Mānaso, rāgo, mānasā, taṇhā, mānasaṃ, sukhaṃ.
anya-e0201n:2985_0: 455. Ajjādīhi tano ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765; caṃ. 3.15; pā. 4.2.105.
anya-e0201n:2986_0: Tatra bhavoti atthe ajjādīhi tano hoti.
anya-e0201n:2988_0: 456. Purāto ṇo ca ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765.
anya-e0201n:2989_0: Tatra bhavoti atthe purāsaddamhā ṇo ca tano ca honti.
anya-e0201n:2990_0: Pure bhavo purāṇo, idha ṇo anubandho na hoti, porāṇo vā, purātano.
anya-e0201n:2993_0: Rājakiccesu raññā saha bhavatīti amacco dī. ni. ṭī. 1.339.
anya-e0201n:2994_0: 458. Majjhādīhimo ka. 353; rū. 378; nī. 767; caṃ. 3.2.82; pā. 4.3.8, 22; ‘majjhāditvimo’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n:2996_1: Evaṃ antimo, heṭṭhimo, uparimo, orimo, pacchimo,
anya-e0201n:2998_0: Bhavatthe sattamyantā ete pañca paccayā honti.
anya-e0201n:2999_0: Kaṇa-kusinārāyaṃ bhavo kosinārako, magadhesu bhavo māgadhako, āraññako, vihāro.
anya-e0201n:3000_0: Ṇeyya-gaṅgāyaṃ bhavo gaṅgeyyo, pabbateyyo, vane bhavo vāneyyo.
anya-e0201n:3001_0: Ṇeyyaka-kosaleyyako, bārāṇaseyyako, campeyyako, mithileyyako, idha na vuddhi.
anya-e0201n:3002_0: Ya-gāme bhavo gammo, dive bhavo dibbo,
anya-e0201n:3007_1: Tamassa sippaṃ sīlaṃ paṇyaṃ paharaṇaṃ payojanaṃ ka. 351; rū. 374; nī. 764; caṃ. 3.4.49- 66 …pe… 4.4.47- 65.
anya-e0201n:3008_4: tamassa payojananti atthesu paṭhamantā ṇiko hoti.
anya-e0201n:3010_10: piṇḍapātena yāpetuṃ sīlañca vatañca dhammo ca garukāro ca assāti piṇḍapātiko.
anya-e0201n:3011_0: ‘Paṇya’nti vikkeyyavatthu vuccati, gandho paṇyaṃ assāti gandhiko. Evaṃ teliko, goḷiko.
anya-e0201n:3012_0: Paharanti etenāti paharaṇaṃ, āvudhabhaṇḍaṃ, cāpo paharaṇamassāti cāpiko. Evaṃ tomariko, muggariko.
anya-e0201n:3013_1: upadhi payojanamassāti opadhikaṃ a. ni. 8.59, puññaṃ,
anya-e0201n:3014_0: 462. Taṃ hantārahati gacchatuñchati carati ka. 351; rū. 374; nī. 764; caṃ. 3.4.27-43; pā. 4.4.28-46.
anya-e0201n:3015_0: Taṃ hanti, taṃ arahati, taṃ gacchati, taṃ uñchati, taṃ caratīti atthesu dutiyantā ṇiko hoti.
anya-e0201n:3018_0: Paradāraṃ gacchatīti pāradāriko, paradāriko vā. Evaṃ pathiko, maggiko.
anya-e0201n:3019_0: Badare uñchati gavesatīti bādariko. Evaṃ āmalakiko.
anya-e0201n:3021_1: Tena kataṃ kītaṃ bandhaṃ abhisaṅkhataṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ hataṃ hanti jitaṃ jayati dibbati khaṇati tarati carati vahati jīvati ka. 350; rū. 373; nī. 364; caṃ. 3.4.1- 26; pā. 4.4.1- 27.
anya-e0201n:3022_0: Tena kataṃ, tena kītaṃ…pe… tena jīvati iccatthesu tatiyantā ṇiko hoti.
anya-e0201n:3023_0: Kāyena kataṃ kāyikaṃ. Evaṃ vācasikaṃ, mānasikaṃ, vātena kato vātiko, ābādho.
anya-e0201n:3024_0: Satena mūlena kītaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ sātikaṃ. Evaṃ sāhassikaṃ.
anya-e0201n:3025_0: Varattāya yottāya bandhito vārattiko, ayasā bandhito āyasiko, sāgamo. Evaṃ pāsiko.
anya-e0201n:3026_0: Ghatena abhisaṅkhataṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ vā ghātikaṃ. Evaṃ goḷikaṃ, dādhikaṃ, māricikaṃ.
anya-e0201n:3028_0: Jālena hantīti jāliko, jālakevaṭṭo. Evaṃ bāḷisiko saṃ. ni. 2.158.
anya-e0201n:3029_0: Akkhehi jitaṃ dhanaṃ akkhikaṃ. Evaṃ sālākikaṃ.
anya-e0201n:3031_0: Khaṇittiyā khaṇatīti khāṇittiko. Evaṃ kuddāliko, idha na vuddhi.
anya-e0201n:3032_0: Uḷumpena taratīti oḷumpiko, uḷumpiko vā. Evaṃ nāviko jā. 2.20.149, gopucchiko.
anya-e0201n:3033_0: Sakaṭena caratīti sākaṭiko. Evaṃ rathiko, yāniko, daṇḍiko,
anya-e0201n:3034_0: Khandhena vahatīti khandhiko. Evaṃ aṃsiko, sīsiko, idha na vuddhi.
anya-e0201n:3035_0: Vetanena jīvatīti vetaniko. Evaṃ bhatiko, kasiko, kayiko, vikkayiko, bhatikādīsu na vuddhi.
anya-e0201n:3037_0: Tassa saṃvattatīti atthe catutthyantā ṇiko hoti.
anya-e0201n:3038_6: saggāya saṃvattatīti sovaggikaṃ dī. ni. 1.163, puññaṃ.
anya-e0201n:3039_0: 465. Tato sambhūtamāgataṃ ka. 351; rū. 374; nī. 765; caṃ. 3.3.49-51; …pe… 4.3.77-79.
anya-e0201n:3040_0: Tato sambhūtaṃ, tato āgataṃ iccatthesu pañcamyantā ṇiko hoti.
anya-e0201n:3041_0: Mātito sambhūtaṃ āgataṃ vā mattikaṃ pārā. 34,
anya-e0201n:3042_0: 466. Tattha vasati vidito bhatto niyutto ka. 351; rū. 374; nī. 765; caṃ. 3.4.70-75 …pe… 4.4.69-74.
anya-e0201n:3044_0: Rukkhamūle vasatīti rukkhamūliko. Evaṃ āraññiko, sosāniko.
anya-e0201n:3045_0: Ettha ca vasatīti sāmaññavacanepi tassīla, tabbata,
anya-e0201n:3045_2: tassādhukāritānaṃ vasena attho veditabbo taddhitapaccayānaṃ pasiddhatthadīpakattā.
anya-e0201n:3045_3: Na hi rukkhamūle muhuttamattaṃ vasanto rukkhamūlikoti voharīyati.
anya-e0201n:3050_0: Tassa idanti atthe chaṭṭhuntā ṇiko hoti.
anya-e0201n:3051_0: Saṅghassa ayaṃ saṅghiko, vihāro, saṅghikā, bhūmi,
anya-e0201n:3057_0: Kaccāyanassa idaṃ kaccāyanaṃ, byākaraṇaṃ. Evaṃ sogataṃ, sāsanaṃ, māhiṃsaṃ, maṃsādi.
anya-e0201n:3060_0: 471. Yamhi gossa ca ka. 78; rū. 31; nī. 229.
anya-e0201n:3061_0: Yavante paccaye pare gossa ca uvaṇṇānañca avaṅa hotīti avādeso.
anya-e0201n:3064_0: 472. Tametthassatthīti mantu ka. 369; rū. 403; nī. 793; caṃ. 4.2.98; pā. 5.2.94.
anya-e0201n:3065_1: taṃ assa atthīti atthesu paṭhamantā mantupaccayo hoti,
anya-e0201n:3069_0: Dīghaṃ āyu asmiṃ atthi, assa vā atthīti āyasmā mahāni. 49. Evaṃ cakkhumā, bandhumā, bhāṇumā iccādi.
anya-e0201n:3070_3: Tattha candasaṅkhātaṃ vimānaṃ assa atthīti candimā dha. pa. 387,
anya-e0201n:3070_7: Ati viya pāpo ajjhāsayo assa atthīti pāpimā saṃ. ni. 1.137, māro.
anya-e0201n:3070_8: Na hi appakena pāpena pāpimāti vuccati pahūtādivasena pasiddhe eva mantādīnaṃ pavattanato.
anya-e0201n:3072_0: Niccayoge ca saṃsagge, hontime mantuādayo”ti moga. 78.
anya-e0201n:3079_0: Tathā vijjamānehi eva satiādīhi satimā iccādayo vuccanti,
anya-e0201n:3079_1: na atītehi anāgatehi ca avijjamānehi, kasmā?
anya-e0201n:3079_3: Evaṃ pana sati kathaṃ pubbepi tvaṃ satimā āsi,
anya-e0201n:3079_5: Tadapi tadā vijjamānāya eva satiyā siddhanti.
anya-e0201n:3080_1: manusso iccādīsu jātisaddesu tesaṃ dabbābhidhānasamatthattā mantādayo na honti,
anya-e0201n:3083_0: Bahavo puttā assa asmiṃ vā santīti puttimo,
anya-e0201n:3083_1: patthaṭā kitti assa asmiṃ vā atthīti kittimo.
anya-e0201n:3083_3: khandhimo, rukkho, puttiyo, kappimo, kappiyo, jaṭimo, jaṭiyo,
anya-e0201n:3083_4: thiraṃ guṇajātaṃ assa asmiṃ vā atthīti theriyo,
anya-e0201n:3092_0: Tehi mantvatthe ika, ī honti vā.
anya-e0201n:3093_1: asmiṃ vā vijjatīti daṇḍiko, daṇḍī, daṇḍavā.
anya-e0201n:3093_2: Evaṃ gandhiko, gandhī, gandhavā, rūpiko, rūpī, rūpavā.
anya-e0201n:3093_4: aññatra dhanī, dhanavā, atthiko, atthī, atthavā.
anya-e0201n:3094_0: Ettha ca asannihitena atthena attho assa atthīti atthiko,
anya-e0201n:3095_1: brahmuno vaṇṇo saṇṭhānaṃ assa atthīti brahmavaṇṇī.
anya-e0201n:3095_3: brahmavaṇṇo viya vaṇṇo yassa so brahmavaṇṇī.
anya-e0201n:3096_1: dantādīhi jātiyaṃ ī, hatthī, dantī, gajo, dāṭhī, kesarī, sīho,
anya-e0201n:3096_9: kārassa attaṃ, uppalinī, kumudinī, bhisinī, muḷālinī, sālukinī,
anya-e0201n:3096_13: sabbaṃ kamalākarassa vā kamalagacchassa vā nāmaṃ,
anya-e0201n:3097_0: Sikhī, sikhāvā, mālī, mālāvā, sīlī, sīlavā, balī, balavā.
anya-e0201n:3098_0: 477. Tapādīhi sī ka. 365; rū. 399; nī. 789; caṃ. 4.2.106; pā. 5.2.102; ‘… ssī’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n:3100_0: Tapo assa asmiṃ vā vijjatīti tapassī, dvittaṃ. Evaṃ yasassī, tejassī, mano assa atthīti manassī.
anya-e0201n:3104_0: Tapo assa atthīti tāpaso, itthiyaṃ tāpasī.
anya-e0201n:3107_4: madhu raso assa atthīti madhuro, guḷo,
anya-e0201n:3110_0: Tundi vuccati vuddhā nābhi, tundibho, valiyo etasmiṃ atthīti valibho.
anya-e0201n:3112_0: 481. Saddhāditva ka. 370; rū. 405; nī. 795; caṃ. 4.2.105; pā. 5.2.101 (saddādivha?).
anya-e0201n:3114_0: Saddhā assa atthi, asmiṃ vā vijjatīti saddho. Evaṃ pañño, sato.
anya-e0201n:3116_0: 482. Ālvābhijjhādīhi ka. 359; rū. 384; nī. 779; caṃ. 4.2.157; pā. 3.2.158.
anya-e0201n:3118_2: dhajā bahulā asmiṃ rathe santīti dhajālu,
anya-e0201n:3122_6: addāriṭṭhako, jaṭilo, jaṭāvā, tāpaso, tuṇḍilo, tuṇḍavā,
anya-e0201n:3125_1: asmiṃ vā vijjatīti sīlavo, puriso, sīlavā, itthī,
anya-e0201n:3125_2: kesā atidīghā asmiṃ santīti kesavo, kesavā,
anya-e0201n:3125_3: aparimāṇā aṇṇā udakā asmiṃ santīti aṇṇavo,
anya-e0201n:3125_4: mahantaṃ balaṃ assa atthīti balavo, balavā, balavaṃ.
anya-e0201n:3125_13: so atthi assa asmiṃ vā gāṇḍīvo ajjunadhanu,
anya-e0201n:3125_15: bahukā rājī assa atthīti rājīvaṃ, paṅkajaṃ.
anya-e0201n:3129_0: 486. Issare āmyuvāmī ka. 364; rū. 398; nī. 787; caṃ. 4.2.143; pā. 5.2.126; “sissare…” (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n:3132_0: 487. Lakkhyā ṇo a ca ka. 364; rū. 398; nī. 787; pā. 5.2.100.
anya-e0201n:3133_0: Lakkhīmhā mantvatthe ṇo hoti, īkārassa attañca hoti.
anya-e0201n:3135_0: 488. Aṅgā no kalyāṇe ka. 364; rū. 398; nī. 787; pā. 5.2.100.
anya-e0201n:3136_0: Kalyāṇe vattabbe aṅgamhā mantvatthe no hoti.
anya-e0201n:3137_0: Kalyāṇaṃ aṅgaṃ etissā itthiyā atthīti aṅganā.
anya-e0201n:3143_1: Tassa bhāvakammesu tta tā ttana ṇya ṇeyyaṇiya ṇa iyā ka. 360; rū. 387; nī. 780; caṃ. 4.1.136- 153; pā. 5.1.119- 136.
anya-e0201n:3144_0: Tassa bhāvo, tassa kammanti atthe chaṭṭhuntā ete aṭṭha paccayā bahulaṃ bhavanti.
anya-e0201n:3146_0: Tattha “gossa bhāvo gotta”nti ettha gojāti bhāvo nāma.
anya-e0201n:3147_0: “Daṇḍino bhāvo daṇḍitta”nti ettha daṇḍadabbaṃ bhāvo nāma.
anya-e0201n:3148_0: “Nīlassa paṭassa bhāvo nīlatta”nti ettha nīlaguṇo bhāvo nāma.
anya-e0201n:3149_0: “Pācakassa bhāvo pācakatta”nti ettha pacanakriyā bhāvo nāma.
anya-e0201n:3150_0: “Tissanāmassa janassa bhāvo tissatta”nti ettha tissanāmaṃ bhāvo nāma.
anya-e0201n:3151_0: Tattha gossa bhāvoti gosaddaṃ sutvā godabbe gobuddhiyā vā godabbaṃ disvā tasmiṃ dabbe govohārassa vā pavattikāraṇanti attho.
anya-e0201n:3156_0: Ṇeyyamhi – sucissa bhāvo soceyyaṃ. Evaṃ ādhipateyyaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n:3157_6: imāni dve pubbe veyyākaraṇapadaṃ viya siddhāni.
anya-e0201n:3158_0: Ṇamhi-garuno bhāvo gāravo, paṭubhāvo pāṭavaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n:3161_0: 491. Bya vaddhadāsā vā ka. 360; rū. 387; nī. 780.
anya-e0201n:3162_0: Bhāva, kammesu vaddha, dāsehi byo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n:3163_0: Vaddhassa bhāvo kammaṃ vā vaddhabyaṃ, vaddhatā, dāsabyaṃ, dāsatā, ‘vaddhava’nti idha ṇe pare vāgamo.
anya-e0201n:3164_0: 492. Naṇa yuvā bo ca vaye ka. 361; rū. 388; nī. 781; caṃ. 4.1.146; pā. 5.1.130; ‘…vassa’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n:3165_0: Vaye gamyamāne bhāva, kammesu yuvato naṇa hoti vā bāgamo ca.
anya-e0201n:3168_0: 493. Aṇvādīhimo ka. 360; rū. 387; nī. 780; caṃ. 4.1.139; pā. 5.1.122; ‘aṇvāditvimo’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n:3170_0: Aṇuno bhāvo aṇimā, laghuno bhāvo laghimā.
anya-e0201n:3172_0: Imapaccaye pare kassa, mahantasaddānaṃ kamena kasa, mahā honti.
anya-e0201n:3177_0: 495. Tamassa parimāṇaṃ ṇiko ca ka. 351; rū. 374; nī. 764; caṃ. 4.1.62; pā. 5.1.57, 58.
anya-e0201n:3178_0: Taṃ assa parimāṇanti atthe paṭhamantā ṇiko hoti ko ca. Parimīyate anenāti parimāṇaṃ.
anya-e0201n:3179_7: Evaṃ tikaṃ, catukkaṃ, pañcakaṃ, chakkaṃ, dvittaṃ. Dasakaṃ, satakaṃ.
anya-e0201n:3180_0: 496. Yatetehi ttako ka. 391; rū. 423; nī. 830; pā. 5.1.22, 23
anya-e0201n:3181_0: Tamassa parimāṇanti atthe ya, ta, etasaddehi sadisadvibhūto ttako hoti.
anya-e0201n:3186_1: Sabbā ca ṭāvantu ka. 391; rū. 423; nī. 830; caṃ. 4.2.43; pā. 5.2.39;
anya-e0201n:3187_0: Tamassa parimāṇanti atthe ya, te’tehi ca sabbato ca ṭāvantu hoti, etassa dvittaṃ.
anya-e0201n:3188_0: Sabbaṃ parimāṇaṃ assāti sabbāvantaṃ, sabbāvā, attho,
anya-e0201n:3188_7: Evaṃ yāvā, yāvantā, yāvanto, tāvā, tāvantā, tāvanto, ettāvā,

anya-e0201n:3496_0: Tattha kriyaṃ dhāretīti dhātu. Sā pakatidhātu, vikatidhātu, nāmadhātuvasena tividhā.
anya-e0201n:3497_0: Tattha bhū, hū, gamu, paca iccādi pakatidhātu nāma sabhāvena siddhattā.
anya-e0201n:3498_0: Titikkha, tikiccha, bubhukkha, jighacchaiccādi vikatidhātu nāma saṅkhatavasena siddhattā.

anya-e0201n:3501_0: Tatthayā dhātu kammāpekkhaṃ kriyaṃ vadati, sā sakammikā nāma. Gāmaṃ gacchati, odanaṃ pacati iccādi.
anya-e0201n:3502_0: Yā kammanirapekkhaṃ kriyaṃ vadati, sā akammikā nāma. Bhavati, hoti, tiṭṭhati, seti iccādi.
anya-e0201n:3504_0: Tattha yā ekakammāpekkhaṃ kriyaṃ vadati, sā ekakammikā nāma. Gāmaṃ gacchati, odanaṃ pacati iccādi.
anya-e0201n:3505_0: Yā padhānā’padhānavasena kammadvayāpekkhaṃ kriyaṃ vadati, sā dvikammikā nāma.
anya-e0201n:3509_6: anekatthattā pana dhātūnaṃ atthantaravacane vā nānupasaggayoge vā akammikāpi sakammikā honti,
anya-e0201n:3514_0: Vida – anubhavane, sukhaṃ vedeti, vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti ma. ni. 3.303.
anya-e0201n:3515_1: vedayāmahaṃ bhante vedayatīti maṃ dhāretu cūḷava. aṭṭha. 102,
anya-e0201n:3518_0: Padānaṃ byañjanasampattiyā vā atthasampattiyā vā upakārakā vibhatti, paccayā paccayā nāma.
anya-e0201n:3519_0: Tattha vibhattiyo tyādi, tvādiiccādinā aṭṭhavidhā bhavanti, sarūpato channavutividhā.
anya-e0201n:3521_0: Tattha parahitapaṭisaṃyuttesu ṭhānesu pavattibahulāni padāni parassapadāni nāma.
anya-e0201n:3523_3: Sādhakaṭṭhena tehi parabhūto kattā paro nāmāti apare.
anya-e0201n:3524_3: parachakkāni pana rūḷhīvasena attanopadāni nāmātipi vadanti.
anya-e0201n:3524_4: Idaṃ na yujjati parachakkesu tabbahulamattassāpi asiddhattā.
anya-e0201n:3524_5: Pāḷibhāsaṃ pana patvā dvinnaṃ chakkānaṃ attahita,
anya-e0201n:3524_6: parahitesu vā tīsu kārakesu vā pavattinānāttaṃ na dissatiyeva,
anya-e0201n:3524_7: tasmā imasmiṃ ganthe taṃ nāmadvayaṃ na gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n:3525_0: Paccayā pana catubbidhā vikaraṇa, kicca, kārita, dhātupaccayavasena.
anya-e0201n:3526_0: Tattha ye dhātusiddhāni tyādipadāni tabbādipadāni ca gaṇavibhāgavasena aññamaññaṃ visadisarūpāni karonti,
anya-e0201n:3528_0: Paresaṃ āṇāpanasaṅkhāte payojakabyāpāre pavattā ṇi, ṇāpipaccayā kāritapaccayā nāma.
anya-e0201n:3529_0: Visuṃ taṃtaṃkriyavācībhāvena dhāturūpā kha, cha, saiccādikā paccayā dhātupaccayā nāma.
anya-e0201n:3531_0: Tattha hiyyattanī, ajjattanī ajjatanī (bahūsu), parokkhāti imā tisso vibhattiyo atīte kāle vattanti.
anya-e0201n:3536_0: Athopi viharissanti, esā buddhāna dhammatā”ti a. ni. 4.21 ca –
anya-e0201n:3537_5: Pacchā pana garuno vatticchāvasena vibhattīnaṃ nānākamaṃ karonti.
anya-e0201n:3539_0: Tesu sādhyabhāvo nānādhātūnaṃ vasena nānāvidho hoti.
anya-e0201n:3539_1: Sādhanabhāvo nānādhātvatthānaṃ pavattākārasaṅkhātena ekaṭṭhena ekova hoti.
anya-e0201n:3539_2: So pana yathā jāti nāma anuppannapakkhe ṭhite saṅkhatadhamme uppādentī viya khāyati,
anya-e0201n:3539_3: tathā vohāravisayamatte ṭhite sabbadhātvatthe pātubhonte karonto viya khāyati,
anya-e0201n:3539_4: tasmā so sādhananti ca kārakanti ca vuccati.
anya-e0201n:3539_5: Yathā ca jātivasena uppannā saṅkhatadhammā “cintanaṃ jātaṃ,
anya-e0201n:3539_6: phusanaṃ jāta” miccādinā ekantameva jātiṃ visesenti,
anya-e0201n:3539_7: tathā paccayatthavasena pātubhontā nānādhātvatthāpi “bhuyyate, gamyate, paccate, bhavanaṃ, gamanaṃ,
anya-e0201n:3539_11: Idha pana dvīsu bhāvesu sādhanabhāvo adhippetoti.
anya-e0201n:3540_2: ‘Puriso’ti ca “yaṃkiñcāyaṃ purisapuggalo paṭisaṃvedeti sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā”ti ma. ni.
anya-e0201n:3541_3: Tattha attano ajjhattasantānabhūtattā amhattho uttamapuriso nāma,
anya-e0201n:3541_7: Idañca nāmaṃ kārakabhede antogadhamevāti katvā imasmiṃ ganthe na gahitanti.
anya-e0201n:3543_2: kulaṃ gacchati” iccādīsu ‘puriso’iccādīnaṃ abhidheyyapadānaṃ liṅgānugato rūpabhedo ākhyātapade natthi.
anya-e0201n:3544_1: na nāmapadaṃ viya dabbaṃ padhānato abhidhātīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0201n:3550_1: Vattamāneti anti si tha mi ma te ante se vhe e mhe ka. 414; rū. 428; nī. 872; caṃ. 1.2.82; pā. 3.2.123.
anya-e0201n:3551_0: Ārabhitvā niṭṭhaṃ anupagato bhāvo vattamāno nāma,
anya-e0201n:3551_2: Vattamāne kāle kriyatthā paraṃ tyādivibhattiyo bhavanti.
anya-e0201n:3551_3: Ayañca vibhatti tyādīti ca vattamānakālavisayattā vattamānāti ca sijjhati.
anya-e0201n:3552_1: Pubbāparachakkānamekānekesu tumhamhasesesu dve dve majjhimuttamapaṭhamā ka. 408; rū. 431; nī. 867.
anya-e0201n:3553_2: tadubhayato sesanāmanti tīsu nāmesu payujjamānesu vā gamyamānesu vā ekasmiṃ vā anekesu vā atthesu pubbachakka,
anya-e0201n:3554_0: Ettha ca vibhattividhānamukhena taṃtaṃsaññāvidhānampi siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n:3555_0: Kathaṃ?Ti, anti, si, tha, mi, ma iti pubbachakkaṃ nāma.
anya-e0201n:3556_0: Te, ante, se, vhe, e, mhe iti parachakkaṃ nāma.
anya-e0201n:3558_0: Tattha tulyādhikaraṇabhūte sesanāme payujjamāne vā gamyamāne vā paṭhamadukaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0201n:3558_3: Dukesu ca ekasmiṃ atthe vattabbe ekavacanaṃ,
anya-e0201n:3559_3: so nāmattho tyādivācakānaṃ eva vāccabhūto vuttattho nāma hoti,
anya-e0201n:3560_1: kammādhiṭṭhānassa ca liṅgatthassa vācakaṃ nāmapadaṃ abhidheyyapadaṃ nāma,
anya-e0201n:3561_0: Amādayo ca atthavācakavibhattiyo etasmiṃ okāsaṃ na labhanti,
anya-e0201n:3561_2: Evarūpāni tulyādhikaraṇabhūtāni abhidheyyapadāni sandhāya sutte ‘tumhamhasesesū’ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0201n:3562_1: sesanāmehi yuttavākye ca missakehi yuttavākye cāti dvīsu dvīsu vākyesu veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n:3563_0: Tattha suddhehi yutte paccekaṃ dukāni vattanti. Yathā?
anya-e0201n:3565_0: Missakehi yutte dvandavākye pana ‘vippaṭisedhe’ti saṅketattā paradukāni eva okāsaṃ labhanti,
anya-e0201n:3566_3: te ca tumhe ca mayañca gacchāma.
anya-e0201n:3568_3: te ca tumhe ca ahañca gacchāma.
anya-e0201n:3569_0: Api ca tvañca so ca gacchatha,
anya-e0201n:3569_6: ahañca te ca gacchāmaiccādīnipi catukkāni veditabbāni.

anya-e0201n:3574_0: Ahañca sāmiko ca dānapatī ahumhā jā. 2.22.1617 iccādi.

anya-e0201n:3581_0: 565. Yuvaṇṇānameo paccaye ka. 485; rū. 434; nī. 975; caṃ. 1.1.82; pā. 3.1.60.

anya-e0201n:3594_0: Sare pare e, onaṃ kamena aya, avā honti. Ya, vesu a-kāro uccāraṇattho.
anya-e0201n:3597_0: Hi, mi, mesu paresu a-kārassa dīgho hoti.
anya-e0201n:3599_0: Parachakke – bhavate, bhavante, bhavase, bhavavhe, bhave, bhavamhe.
anya-e0201n:3601_0: Adhyā’bhi, paripubbo hiṃsāyaṃ, adhibhavati, abhibhavati, paribhavati.

anya-e0201n:3604_0: Abhi, saṃpubbo pattiyaṃ, ajjhogāhe ca, abhisambhavati, tathā pātubbhavati, āvibhavati iccādi.

anya-e0201n:3631_0: Tesu ca ākārantato ‘ato’ (moga.) ṇāpiyeva hoti, dāpeti, dāpayati.
anya-e0201n:3633_0: Sesato dvepi, pāceti, pācayati, pācāpeti, pācāpayati.
anya-e0201n:3637_2: āvā honti sarādo ṇānubandhe paccaye pare,
anya-e0201n:3640_0: Jhe-cintāyaṃ, jhāyati, jhāyanti, ujjhāyati, nijjhāyati iccādi.
anya-e0201n:3642_0: Ṇi, ṇāpi, āpīhi ca kattari lo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n:3644_0: Iminā asare ṭhāne ayādesato paraṃ akāro hoti,
anya-e0201n:3649_0: Kriyatthā parassa kyassa ādimhi īña hoti.
anya-e0201n:3656_0: Ekakammā dvikammā ca, dvikammā ca tikammakā.
anya-e0201n:3658_0: Katturūpena cettha kammakatturūpampi saṅgayhati. Kusūlo bhijjati, bhijjanadhammo bhijjati.
anya-e0201n:3659_1: Tattha yaṃ padaṃ kattuvācakaṃ samānaṃ saddarūpena kammarūpaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0201n:3661_0: Tathā so pahīyethāpi nopi pahīyetha saṃ. ni. 1.249,

anya-e0201n:3662_2: kattari eva yujjati kammani ivaṇṇāgamassa sabbhāvā.
anya-e0201n:3662_3: Saddanītiyaṃ pana “so pahīyissatī”ti padānaṃ bhāvarūpattaṃ daḷhaṃ vadati,
anya-e0201n:3663_0: Ettha ca vattamānaṃ catubbidhaṃ niccapavattaṃ, pavattāvirataṃ, pavattuparataṃ, samīpavattamānanti.
anya-e0201n:3665_0: Pavattāvirate – api nu te gahapati kule dānaṃ dīyatīti, dīyati me bhante kule dānaṃ a. ni. 9.20.
anya-e0201n:3666_1: tāva yathāpavattā dānakriyā vattamānā eva nāma hoti ussāhassa aviratattā.
anya-e0201n:3667_5: tāva viramaṇakriyā vattamānā eva nāma hoti.
anya-e0201n:3668_1: kuto nu tvaṃ āgacchasi saṃ. ni. 1.130,

anya-e0201n:3673_0: Kadā karahiyogepi-kadā gacchati, karahi gacchati, gamissati vā.

anya-e0201n:3678_0: Vattamāne kāle pañha, patthanā, vidhīsu kriyatthā tvādayo honti.

anya-e0201n:4280_0: Kārite vuddhi natthi, gameti, gamayati, gamāpeti, gamāpayati.

anya-e0201n:4283_0: Ajjhattanimhi īādīsu ikārāgamo, so agamī, gamī.

anya-e0201n:4290_0: Rassatte- agamimha, gamimha, agamumhā, gamumhā, agamumha, gamumha,

anya-e0201n:4294_3: ahaṃ agama, gama, agamaṃ, gamaṃ vā, agamimhe, gamimhe.

anya-e0201n:4300_0: So agā, te agū, tvaṃ ago, tumhe aguttha, ahaṃ agaṃ, mayaṃ agumhā.

anya-e0201n:4318_0: Kārite-gacchāpeti, gacchāpayati. Gacchatu, gacchantu, gaccheyya, gaccheyyuṃ.
anya-e0201n:4323_0: Īādimhi-agacchi, gacchi, agacchuṃ, gacchuṃ, agacchiṃsu, gacchiṃsu.

anya-e0201n:4326_0: So agañchā, gañchā. Tathā agañchū, gacchū.

anya-e0201n:5969_6: ghosati sādhukārenāti ghosano, kodhano, dūsano, padūsano, kopano, calano, phandano, kampano, maṇḍano, bhūsano,

anya-e0201n:5974_0: Vīhismiṃ kāle ca vattabbe hādhātumhā kattari ṇānubandho ano hoti.
anya-e0201n:5975_0: Hāpetīti hāyano, vīhiviseso vassañca. “Kuñjaraṃ saṭṭhihāyana”nti ettha vassaṃ hāyananti vuccati.
anya-e0201n:5980_0: Āsīsā vuccati patthanā, āsīsāyaṃ gamyamānāyaṃ ako hoti kattari.
anya-e0201n:5982_1: so ca sāmaññavidhānattā arahe sattiyaṃ sīle dhamme sādhukāre ca sijjhati,
anya-e0201n:5984_0: Vikaraṇapaccayato paraṃ nāgame sati vikaraṇassa rasso, jānanako, ājānanako, vijānanako, sañjānanako.
anya-e0201n:5989_0: Bhūmiyaṃ setīti bhūmisāyako, sayāpetīti sayāpako, pāhetīti pahiṇako iccādi.
anya-e0201n:5991_3: upāsatīti upāsako- puriso, upāsikā- itthī, upāsakaṃ- kulaṃ,
anya-e0201n:6010_0: Dhātūnaṃ sutisaṅkhāte sarūpe vattabbe kriyatthā paraṃ i, ki, tipaccayā honti.
anya-e0201n:6015_6: etesu sīlādīsu kriyāvisesesu gamyamānesu kattari ṇī hoti.
anya-e0201n:6019_7: āyukappassa antare vemajjhe avassaṃ parinibbāyissatīti antarāparinibbāyī,
anya-e0201n:6019_8: āyukappapariyosānaṃ upahacca avassaṃ parinibbāyissatīti upahaccaparinibbāyī iccādi.
anya-e0201n:6021_7: niccakālaṃ jhāyatīti vā jhāyī, pajjhāyī, ujjhāyī, nijjhāyī,
anya-e0201n:6026_1: taṃ dhammaṃ carāmīti daḷhaṃ gaṇhitvā yāva na vijahati,
anya-e0201n:6026_2: tāva avītikkamanaṭṭhena dhammaṃ carati sīlenāti dhammacārī nāma.
anya-e0201n:6026_3: Tathācaranto ca antarāvītikkamanīyavatthusamāyoge sati taṃ dhammaṃ apatamānaṃ katvā dhārento saṃvaraṇaṭṭhena
anya-e0201n:6026_6: paravambhanādīhi pāpadhammehi anupakkiliṭṭhañca appicchatādīhi santaguṇehi supariyodātañca karonto pariyodāpanaṭṭhena
anya-e0201n:6027_1: tampi gaṇhitvā avijahanto antarā ca apatamānaṃ katvā dhārento anupakkiliṭṭhaṃ supariyodātañca karonto tividhena atthena brahmacārī nāma, samādāna, sampatta,
anya-e0201n:6027_3: yo pana gaṇhanto tathā na dhāreti,
anya-e0201n:6028_0: Yo pana tividhena atthena mutto hutvā kadāci taṃ dhammaṃ carati,
anya-e0201n:6030_19: virūpaṃ pāpapakkhaṃ paṭimukhaṃ abhiṇhaṃ sarati cintetīti vippaṭisārī,
anya-e0201n:6031_0: Haritabbaṃ sabbaṃ harati sīlenāti hārahārī iccādi.
anya-e0201n:6042_2: jeṭṭhavacanaṃ ādarena suṇāti sīlenāti assavo- putto,
anya-e0201n:6045_0: Vidati sīlenāti vidū, lokavidū, paracittavidū. Itthiyaṃ paracittavidunī.
anya-e0201n:6051_0: Sabbaṃ jānāti sīlenāti sabbaññū, rattaññū, atthaññū, dhammaññū, kālaññū, samayaññū.
anya-e0201n:6053_0: Kammupapadā gamamhā rū hoti kattari. ‘Rānubandhentasarādissā’ti sabbadhātvantalopo.
anya-e0201n:6059_0: Itthiliṅge vattabbe bhāvakārakesu a, ṇa,ti, ka, yaka, yapaccayā ca ano ca hoti.
anya-e0201n:6060_0: Ka, a, ṇa, yaka, ya, anaiccetehi ‘itthiyamatvā’ti āpaccayo.
anya-e0201n:6061_0: Kamhi tāva-attani nisinnaṃ gūhati saṃvaratīti guhā, attānaṃ vā paraṃ vā dūsetīti dūsā-dhuttitthī.
anya-e0201n:6062_0: Muda-hāse, modanaṃ mudā, pamudā, sujjhati etāyāti sudhā, vasuṃ ratanaṃ dhāretīti vasudhā iccādi.
anya-e0201n:6064_3: aññamaññaṃ upecca nissāya ca dhiyyatīti upanidhā-
anya-e0201n:6064_7: visiṭṭhaṃ katvā attānaṃ dahanti etāyāti vidhā- māno,
anya-e0201n:6073_0: Oja-thambhane tejane ca, ojeti taṃsamaṅgine satte saṅkhāre ca samupatthambhati samuttejetīti vā ojā.
anya-e0201n:6074_15: uparibhāvaṃ suṭṭhu pajjanti pāpuṇanti etāyāti upasampadā,
anya-e0201n:6074_20: paṭisaṃbhijjanti atthādīsu ñāṇappabhedaṃ gacchanti etāyāti paṭisambhidā,
anya-e0201n:6076_2: sikkhanti ghaṭenti sekkhā janā etthāti sikkhā,
anya-e0201n:6083_0: Jāgara-niddakkhaye, jāgaraṇaṃ jāgariyā, seti etthāti seyyā, dvittaṃ.
anya-e0201n:6090_7: dvitte dhassa dattaṃ rasso ca, dīdhiti- raṃsi.
anya-e0201n:6091_27: cāyanaṃ pūjanaṃ citi, dvitte- citti, apaciti,
anya-e0201n:6101_0: 804. Samānaññabhavantayāditūpamānā disā kamme rīrikkhakā ka. 642; rū. 588; nī. 1269.
anya-e0201n:6102_0: Samāno ca añño ca bhavanto ca yādi ca etehi upamānabhūtehi paraṃ disamhā kammerī ca rikkho ca ko cāti ete paccayā honti, rī,
anya-e0201n:6103_0: Ya, ta, eta, ima, kiṃ, tumha, amha, bhavanta, samāna, añña.
anya-e0201n:6104_0: Yo viya dissatīti yādī, yādikkho, yādiso,
anya-e0201n:6104_3: yā viya dissatīti yādinī, yādikkhā, yādikkhī, yādisā, yādisī,
anya-e0201n:6105_0: So viya dissatīti tādī, tādikkho, tādiso.
anya-e0201n:6106_0: Eso viya dissatīti edī, edikkho, ediso, etādī, etādikkho, etādiso vā.
anya-e0201n:6107_0: Ayaṃ viya dissatīti īdī, īdikkho, īdiso.
anya-e0201n:6108_0: Ko viya dissatīti kīdī, kīdikkho, kīdiso.
anya-e0201n:6109_0: Tvaṃ viya dissatīti tādī, tādikkho, tādiso.
anya-e0201n:6110_0: Ahaṃ viya dissatīti mādī, mādikkho, mādiso.
anya-e0201n:6111_0: Bahutte pana tumhe viya dissantīti tumhādī, tumhādikkho, tumhādiso.
anya-e0201n:6112_0: Amhe viya dissantīti amhādī, amhādikkho, amhādiso.
anya-e0201n:6113_0: Bhavaṃ viya dissatīti bhavādī, bhavādikkho, bhavādiso.
anya-e0201n:6114_0: Samāno viya dissatīti sadī, sadikkho, sadiso.
anya-e0201n:6115_0: Añño viya dissatīti aññādī, aññādikkho, aññādiso.
anya-e0201n:6116_0: Itthiyaṃ-yā viya dissatīti yādisā-itthī, yādisī-itthī. Tādisā-itthī, tādisī-itthī iccādi.
anya-e0201n:6131_2: gotrabhū”tiādīsu ca kvimhi antabyañjanalope kvilope ca kate mahāvuttinā upantassa ottaṃ katvā goiti pakatirūpaṃ veditabbaṃ,
anya-e0201n:6133_0: 809. Kvimhi gho paripaccāsamohi ka. 538; rū. 595; nī. 1123; ‘…pacca…’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n:6134_0: Pari ca pati ca ā ca sañca o ca etehi parassa hanassa gho hoti kvimhi.
anya-e0201n:6136_0: Suttavibhattiyā aññatopi gho hoti, mātaraṃ hanatīti mātugho. Evaṃ pitugho iccādi.
anya-e0201n:6138_1: upari vuccamāno sabbo ṇvādikaṇḍo imassa suttassa niddeso hoti,
anya-e0201n:6139_2: ayanti vaḍḍhanti sattā etenāti vā āyu- jīvitaṃ,
